sense.def:
Exposure to something dangerous
pomeni izpostavljenost nečemu nevarnemu.

seg.quote: He was suffering from exposure to nuclear radiation.

sense.def:
Exposure
je tudi škodljiv vpliv zelo hladnega vremena na človekovo telo.

seg.quote: The group's leader died of exposure.
...giving the widest possible exposure to scenes of casualties and damage.

sense.def:
The exposure of a well-known person
je razkritje resnice o znani osebnosti, zlasti kadar gre za nepošteno ali nespodobno vedênje.

Pri fotografiranju je
an exposure
ena slika.

seg.quote: ...a camera capable of taking a hundred exposures before the film needs changing.
